author: andschwa
body: this issue is in investigation with the CoreCLR team  This seems to relate to which assembly is a platform assembly and which isn't. See emails from Jan for details.  VSO create date - 7/29/2015 6:03:00     VSO closed date - 8/25/2015 10:18:00
title: call into Main of PowerShell assembly instead of UnmanagedMain
